title.message: Known issues in Adblock Plus for Google Chrome

s1.message: The following lists issues known to affect Adblock Plus for Google Chrome.

s2.message: If your problem isn't listed, please check the forum and create a new topic if necessary (registration is not required).

s3.message: The page "Adblock Plus has been installed" opens each time the browser is started

s6.message: , file storage got corrupted and Adblock Plus data cannot be saved

s7.message: Solution: Remove Adblock Plus and install it again from Google Web Store (this clears all Adblock Plus data and should resolve the breakage). If this doesn't help: go to the directory where Chrome stores your data (on Windows:

s12.message:
This won't make matters worse: the
  data in this folder is already corrupted.

s13.message:
Removing the directory will allow Chrome
  to create it again and use it correctly.

s14.message: Adblock Plus doesn't block in-video ads, background images, XMLHttpRequests

s15.message: Cause: Google Chrome currently doesn't allow blocking any of these request types

s17.message: Text-based ads sometimes don't get blocked

s18.message: Cause: Delay in blocking caused by the way Adblock Plus currently blocks things
